page.title: 13 THE COMMUNITY POLICEMAN
page.content: Our community Policeman is called Glyn Burndred. We asked him about his job. He said, "A community constable is a constable with a special responsibility towards the people in his area, to help any person who has a need of any description. He provides a bridge between the man in the street and the police and is readily available because he travels on foot or bicycle." He has been a community policeman for 4 years. He said he likes being a community policeman because he likes meeting peaple and solving problems. A community policeman only carries a radio - no truncheon or weapons. A community policemen never goes in a car. He walks or goes on a bicycle.
